titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Delaware River in Pennsylvania and New Jersey as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

bill.summary: 1/8/1987--Introduced. Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Delaware River in Pennsylvania and New Jersey as a component of the national wild and scenic rivers system.
